TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabPage extends System.Windows.Forms.Panel

summary.span: 表示 中的单个选项卡页。

span.span: Represents a single tab page in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示中的选项卡式的页控件。 controls represent the tabbed pages in a control. 中的选项卡页的顺序集合会反映在选项卡的顺序控件。The order of tab pages in the collection reflects the order of tabs in the control. 若要更改控件中的选项卡的顺序，必须通过删除它们，并将它们插入到新索引处更改它们在集合中的位置。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes. 控件都受其容器，因此的某些属性继承自基的类将具有不起作用，包括， ， ， ， ，和。 controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the base class will have no effect, including , , , , , and . 中的选项卡属于但不是包括个人的一部分控件。The tabs in a are part of the but not parts of the individual controls. 成员类，如属性，会影响仅选项卡页，但不是制表符的客户端矩形。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，方法编辑不会隐藏选项卡。若要隐藏选项卡上，必须删除控件从集合。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分和的事件发生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，和的事件操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 有关此控件如何响应的详细信息和方法，请参阅以下成员： ， ， ， ， ， .For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . > [!NOTE] > 中包含的控件显示选项卡页，并显示的选项卡页不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定时才会创建。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、属性使您可以指示是否应呈现选项卡页的背景，使用当前的视觉样式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style. 发生这种情况仅当和属性值都是`true`和的父属性是。This occurs only when the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is . 否则，通常绘制背景。Otherwise, the background is painted normally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有一个。The following code example creates a with one . 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值属性是值的属性除非和属性值都是`true`和的父属性的值为，在这种情况下的默认值属性是。The default value of the property is the value of the property unless the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent has a value of , in which case the default value of the property is . 子控件，你将放置在继承默认情况下，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 更改的值属性将自动设置属性`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果你想背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想要继承的子控件你指定的值设置属性设置后属性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建包含两个对象时，各包含一个组件。The following code example creates a with two objects, each containing one component. 参数`button2`传递给方法，检索包含`button2`。The parameter `button2` is passed to the method, which retrieves the containing `button2`. 若要验证检索时正确的选项卡页，属性集包含`button2`到当前选定的选项卡页。To verify that the correct tab page is retrieved, the property sets the containing `button2` to the currently selected tab page. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnter (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分和的事件发生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，和的事件操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示当用户按 TAB 键在窗体上控件接收焦点的顺序。The property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form. 控件都包含在控件，但是，并且不会收到焦点单独窗体的 tab 键顺序的一部分。 controls are contained within controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order. 因此，此属性是此类无意义。This property is therefore meaningless for this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性值不会不自动居中的选项卡上的新值这是如果具有属性值。Changing the property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the has a property value of . 可以通过设置来解决此限制属性或通过删除从集合并将其添加回集合。You can work around this limitation by setting the property or by removing the from the collection and adding it back to the collection. 这两种操作将使文本自动居中。Both of these actions will automatically center the text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有一个。The following code example creates a with one . 属性将选项卡页文本设置为`myTabPage`。The property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 获取或设置该选项卡的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.

value.span: 该选项卡的工具提示文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text for this tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此选项卡页属于。This tab page belongs to a . 当用户的选项卡上移动鼠标，如果不显示工具提示文本属性是`true`。The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the property of the is `true`. 有关工具提示的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about ToolTips, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建包含两个对象。The following code example creates a with two objects. 设置为允许工具提示和选项卡页分配的工具提示文本。The is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseVisualStyleBackColor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当启用视觉样式时， 背景是否使用当前视觉样式呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.

value.span: 表示使用当前视觉样式呈现背景；否则，为 。

span.span: to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景使用当前的视觉样式时，才和属性值都是`true`。The background uses the current visual style only when the and property values are both `true`. 当和属性值都是`true`和的父属性是的默认值属性是。When the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is , the default value of the property is . 子控件，你将放置在继承默认情况下，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 更改的值属性将自动设置属性`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果你想背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想要继承的子控件你指定的值设置属性设置后属性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员对于此控件无意义。This member is not meaningful for this control. 若要隐藏选项卡中的，则必须将其删除从控件的集合。To hide a tab in a , you must remove it from the control's collection.

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理事件来检测更改。The property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the event to detect the change. 若要隐藏选项卡中的，则必须将其删除从控件的集合。To hide a tab in a , you must remove it from the control's collection.
